channel.title: Well well well, look who comes crawling back
channel.description:
Ill say bye and goodluck, but rscheating is like a drug, your hooked and you cant get off the forums, my bet is that youll be back eventually.
Mopar - 1 jme_009 - 0 You win this round mopar :P Yes, tis true. I feel almost embarrased about coming back, after insisting 100 times that there was no way I was going to come back. I guess I made a fool out of myself, because I wish to come back now. I lasted nearly 3 months, I guess that's not too bad. But I was so sick of coming onto forums, the idea never even crossed my mind until recently when James convinced me to come into the irc room. Well, it was nice seeing old faces and I started looking on the forums to see what was new. Then I found myself in various positions where I would have liked to make a comment on something. Not to mention that my friend,(known as coatbridge) started posting on here. She's not exactly a friend, just someone I know from school, and when we were working on our photography project various times at her place or mine, she'd be online posting and it reminded me how much I used to like it here. I took a quick look around, looks like most of the people I used to look up to are still here and active, such as PaulT. I have a funny feeling he doesn't like me, but I think he's cool because he could make any thread turn funny or prove a point easily. On a second note, wow! When I left there was like 5k members, now all of sudden there is 30k. Im sure most of them are first-time posters but hopefully it also means there are some new friendly members here. As for whats been happening to me lately, not a whole lot. Realised that my gf was a total bitch so I dumped her, and I'm not looking forward to going to Britain next semester anymore, I might just stay home but the money was great to have. Unfortunatly all I was allowed to do with my money was to put 1000 into my bank and use the rest for college. I don't see why my parents should be allowed to choose how my money is used, but whatever. So, um? Hi :)

@mjordan wrote:

hey welcome back jme. u prolly dont really know me cuz we never talk but ive been around a while. back from kaits. but neways good to have you back

Read full topic

Although, I am so tired of blitz but I am thinking about making a 3d car racing game, using mopar muscle cars and stuff

Read full topic

ilyaostr9:

Hey man, wazzup? How’s Afelhem doing?

Said it before, I quit it. Quit it a long time ago.

Yet, smacker wont let anyone find out. He wont let me post on the forums, because he’s probably gona try to scam them to get some of the money he lost. I’ll make sure he doesn’t, but he temp closed the forums since I kept telling people what happened.

item.source: Well well well, look who comes crawling back

item.title: Well well well, look who comes crawling back
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

jme_009:

[quote=moparisthebest]Ill say bye and goodluck, but rscheating is like a drug, your hooked and you cant get off the forums, my bet is that youll be back eventually.

Mopar - 1
jme_009 - 0

You win this round mopar

Yes, tis true. I feel almost embarrased about coming back, after insisting 100 times that there was no way I was going to come back. I guess I made a fool out of myself, because I wish to come back now.

I lasted nearly 3 months, I guess that’s not too bad. But I was so sick of coming onto forums, the idea never even crossed my mind until recently when James convinced me to come into the irc room. Well, it was nice seeing old faces and I started looking on the forums to see what was new. Then I found myself in various positions where I would have liked to make a comment on something. Not to mention that my friend,(known as coatbridge) started posting on here. She’s not exactly a friend, just someone I know from school, and when we were working on our photography project various times at her place or mine, she’d be online posting and it reminded me how much I used to like it here.

I took a quick look around, looks like most of the people I used to look up to are still here and active, such as PaulT. I have a funny feeling he doesn’t like me, but I think he’s cool because he could make any thread turn funny or prove a point easily.

On a second note, wow! When I left there was like 5k members, now all of sudden there is 30k. Im sure most of them are first-time posters but hopefully it also means there are some new friendly members here.

As for whats been happening to me lately, not a whole lot. Realised that my gf was a total bitch so I dumped her, and I’m not looking forward to going to Britain next semester anymore, I might just stay home but the money was great to have. Unfortunatly all I was allowed to do with my money was to put 1000 into my bank and use the rest for college. I don’t see why my parents should be allowed to choose how my money is used, but whatever.

So, um? Hi :)[/quote]

Hey man, you still remember me? I think it was you and me that had a “near” flame war in debate forums.

I used to be active but have been stayin low for a couple of months now, still visit but almost never post.

Read full topic
item.source: Well well well, look who comes crawling back

item.title: Well well well, look who comes crawling back
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:17, topic:18743”]I r teh DJ!

Oh and Jamie, I guess you’re on all kinds of drugs too xD[/quote]

No, I’m not. I smoke weed like once every few weeks, but I like drinking a lot more. Every weekend there are wild parties now, and I usually just drink. Still only in Grade 11. But, our town has a lot of drugs circulating around, downtown is full of crack addicts and all those unpleasent things.

Read full topic

item.source: Well well well, look who comes crawling back

item.title: Well well well, look who comes crawling back
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:18743”][quote]
Jamie you have the most pathetic will power I have ever witnessed.

But then again who’s complaining

Welcome back for the 3rd time, (Don’t think I forgot about your fiasco about leaving Kait’s forums a year back), your past shall haunt you forever [/quote]

Rofl, quit rubbing it in. And I think that’s only twice I left for the summer, then somewhere mid summer I decided to post saying I was gonna leave for ever.

The first time at kaitnieks, I didn’t want to leave, but I was trying to because I couldn’t get anything done I was always just posting. This time, I really did want to leave, and I left all forums because I lost interest in them. Well, I started posting on Akriam’s forums, then james made me go into the irc, I then was reading up info about what RaW has been doing, then I found myself reading other posts and stuff, and actually enjoying it. I’ll make you a deal, if I need to leave again I’ll just put it in my signiture

edit* Yes Bullzeye. My whole damn school/town is.[/quote]

Heh it should be like:

Today:

Mood: Happy
Weather: 72 Degrees Celsius
Leaving: No

Heh you know I’m just playing with your mate, its just that you keep reminding me of Lance Armstrong so I kinda wanted to rub it in

Hope you’ll stay! Puts Jamie in shackles

Read full topic

But then again who’s complaining

Welcome back for the 3rd time, (Don’t think I forgot about your fiasco about leaving Kait’s forums a year back), your past shall haunt you forever

Rofl, quit rubbing it in. And I think that’s only twice I left for the summer, then somewhere mid summer I decided to post saying I was gonna leave for ever.

The first time at kaitnieks, I didn’t want to leave, but I was trying to because I couldn’t get anything done I was always just posting. This time, I really did want to leave, and I left all forums because I lost interest in them. Well, I started posting on Akriam’s forums, then james made me go into the irc, I then was reading up info about what RaW has been doing, then I found myself reading other posts and stuff, and actually enjoying it. I’ll make you a deal, if I need to leave again I’ll just put it in my signiture

edit* Yes Bullzeye. My whole damn school/town is.
